sentences.en: They run their business from a small storefront.
sentences.cn: 他们在一间狭小的铺面房中做生意。

sentences.en: Golden Hill Properties in Wanchai makes do with a storefront but no store.
sentences.cn: 金山财产公司在湾仔区有一家店头，却没有商店。

sentences.en: Customers register within an extended site to gain access to the storefront.
sentences.cn: 客户在扩展站点中注册以获得访问存储的能力。
